miDulceOnline.name: MiDulceOnline
miDulceOnline.about: MiDulceOnline is a project that simulates a sales page. We used react for the frontend and for the backend Node.Js. The page has: Data flow to the database elaborated in MongoDB and deployed in Atlas. User authentication process. Emails management for contact. Invoices elaboration.

gameOfLife.name: Game of life
gameOfLife.about: Model of the 'Game of Life' using Python and the Pygame library. This project helped me to learn and understand the object oriented programming paradigm.

sortedProject.name: Sorted Project
sortedProject.about: App that allows to visualize different numerical sorting algorithms, for example: Shell Sort, Bubble Sort, Insertion Sort.
